statements.select: SELECT T.LOC_NO,T.LOC_NAME,T.AUTO_PALLET_REQUEST,T.PALLET_TYPE, CASE T.AUTO_PALLET_REQUEST WHEN 0 THEN '不允许' ELSE '允许' END AS AUTO_PALLET_REQUEST1 FROM PSB_LOC T WHERE T.PALLET_TYPE IS NOT NULL and T.LOC_TYPE_NO ='2001' ORDER BY T.LOC_NO
SELECT T.LOC_NO,T.LOC_NAME,T.LOC_ENABLE,T.LOC_PLC_NO, CASE T.LOC_ENABLE WHEN 1 THEN '可用' ELSE '不可用' END AS LOC_ENABLE1 FROM PSB_LOC T WHERE T.LOC_TYPE_NO ='7001' ORDER BY T.LOC_NO

select loc_no, loc_plc_no, loc_type_no, loc_name, loc_mes_no, loc_priority, loc_enable, area_no, transfer_no, limit_cmd_qty, case when wms_mes_lock = 0 then 'WMS拉动' when wms_mes_lock = 1 then 'MES拉动' end as wms_mes_lock from psb_loc WHERE loc_type_no in ('3000', '6002', '5000', '7002', '2002')

SELECT LOC.LOC_NO,LOC.LOC_PLC_NO,LOC.LOC_NAME,LOC.LOC_TYPE_NO,LT.LOC_TYPE_NAME,LOC.AREA_NO,AREA.PAREA_NO, OM.REQUEST_FLAG TASK_REQUEST_FLAG,OM.REQUEST_DATE TASK_REQUEST_DATE,OM.PALLET_NO TASK_REQUEST_PALLET_NO, OM.ERR_DESC TASK_REQUEST_ERR_DESC, CM.REQUEST_FLAG CMD_REQUEST_FLAG,CM.REQUEST_DATE CMD_REQUEST_REQUEST_DATE,CM.ERR_DESC CMD_REQUEST_ERR_DESC, CM.TASK_NO CMD_REQUEST_TASK_NO,CM.PALLET_NO CMD_REQUEST_PALLET_NO, LS.TASK_NO CURRENT_TASK_NO,LS.PALLET_NO CURRENT_PALLET_NO,LS.UPDATE_DATE CURRENT_UPDATE_DATE FROM PSB_LOC LOC JOIN PSB_AREA AREA ON LOC.AREA_NO = AREA.AREA_NO JOIN PSB_LOC_TYPE LT ON LOC.LOC_TYPE_NO = LT.LOC_TYPE_NO JOIN Z30_LOC_0101_ORDER_MONITOR OM ON LOC.LOC_NO = OM.LOC_NO JOIN Z30_LOC_0301_CMD_MONITOR CM ON LOC.LOC_NO = CM.LOC_NO JOIN PEM_LOC_STATUS LS ON LOC.LOC_NO = LS.LOC_NO WHERE LOC.LOC_ENABLE = 1
AREA.PAREA_NO LIKE '%'||#where.PAREA_NO#||'%'
LOC.LOC_TYPE_NO LIKE '%'||#where.LOC_TYPE_NO#||'%'
LOC.LOC_PLC_NO LIKE '%'||#where.LOC_PLC_NO#||'%'
ORDER BY LOC.LOC_NO

SELECT T.TASK_NO, CASE T.IO_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' WHEN 'T' THEN '移位' WHEN 'S' THEN '移库' ELSE '未知' END IO_TYPE, WC.SLOC_NO,WC.SLOC_PLC_NO,WC.ELOC_NO,WC.ELOC_PLC_NO, T.PALLET_NO,T.MATERIAL_NO, CASE T.TASK_STEP WHEN '0000' THEN '等待' WHEN '1000' THEN '堆垛机-等待' WHEN '1002' THEN '堆垛机-执行' WHEN '1004' THEN '堆垛机-完成' WHEN '2000' THEN '输送线-等待' WHEN '2002' THEN '输送线-执行' WHEN '2004' THEN '输送线-完成' ELSE '未知' END TASK_STEP, T.CREATION_DATE,T.TASK_EXEC_START_DT START_DATE,WC.FINISH_DATE FROM WBS_TASK T JOIN WBS_TASK_CMD WC ON T.TASK_GUID = WC.TASK_GUID
WC.SLOC_NO LIKE '%'||#where.LOC_NO#||'%'
ORDER BY T.CREATION_DATE

SELECT T.TASK_NO, CASE T.IO_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' WHEN 'T' THEN '移位' WHEN 'S' THEN '移库' ELSE '未知' END IO_TYPE, WC.SLOC_NO,WC.SLOC_PLC_NO,WC.ELOC_NO,WC.ELOC_PLC_NO, T.PALLET_NO,T.MATERIAL_NO, CASE T.TASK_STEP WHEN '0000' THEN '等待' WHEN '1000' THEN '堆垛机-等待' WHEN '1002' THEN '堆垛机-执行' WHEN '1004' THEN '堆垛机-完成' WHEN '2000' THEN '输送线-等待' WHEN '2002' THEN '输送线-执行' WHEN '2004' THEN '输送线-完成' ELSE '未知' END TASK_STEP, T.CREATION_DATE,T.TASK_EXEC_START_DT START_DATE,WC.FINISH_DATE FROM WBS_TASK T JOIN WBS_TASK_CMD WC ON T.TASK_GUID = WC.TASK_GUID
WC.ELOC_NO LIKE '%'||#where.LOC_NO#||'%'
ORDER BY T.CREATION_DATE
